verses.name: 2 Chronicles 12:7
verses.text: And when the Lord saw that they humbled themselves, the word of the Lord came to Shemaiah, saying, They have humbled themselves; therefore I will not destroy them, but I will grant them some deliverance; and my wrath shall not be poured out upon Jerusalem by the hand of Shishak.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 12:8
verses.text: Nevertheless they shall be his servants; that they may know my service, and the service of the kingdoms of the countries.
